TextView.android:text: RCRS's was created to report pothole locations to the driver of a vehicle and increase safety and awareness for drivers. The application functions as a directions service which can show nearby potholes and help users avoid potential road hazards. RCRS can also make it easier for potholes to be reported through manual or automatic submission using the phones accelerometer.

Poor road conditions are very common in the United States, and according to a study by the American Automobile Association, pothole damage costs U.S. drivers roughly $3 billion dollars annually. From 2011 to 2016, 16 million drivers in the U.S. reported pothole damage. In terms of states, Michigan is one of the worst for quality of city roads. Detroit and Grand Rapids both cracked the top ten in highest percentage of roads in poor condition for large urban areas. It is believed that it would cost the U.S. government around $2.7 trillion dollars to fix highway and bridge infrastructure.
